law.catch_line: The County Commissioners of Cecil County shall have the power by resolution or ordinance to adopt, a...
law.text: The County Commissioners of Cecil County shall have the power by resolution or ordinance to adopt, and to amend from time to time, rules and regulations for the control of air and water pollution and industrial waste emanating from the land area of that county, to provide for the appointment of inspectors for the enforcement thereof and to provide penalties for the violations of such rules and regulations.
